title: Email Template
description: A saved email message that can be sent by the application during registration, submission, peer review and all other operations of the application.

alternateTo.description: The `key` of another email template. This is used to assign a custom template to a `Mailable`. The value of `alternateTo` must match the email template key of a `Mailable`.

body.description: The email template to be used in the email's main body content.

contextId.description: The ID of the context (journal/press) this email is related to. Only used for custom email templates. Default is `null`.

key.description: A unique key for this email template.

name.description: A name for this email template.

subject.description: The subject of the email to be used in the email's subject header.
